english: Laser beams may cauterize and heal ulcers .
chinese: 激光束可以烧灼和愈合溃疡。

english: The ulcer has perforated into the lesser omental bursa .
The wound festers during several days of torture .
chinese: 伤口溃疡了，折腾了我好几天。

english: For several days, he has had an exacerbation of ulcer symptoms .
chinese: 近日他溃疡病症状加剧。
溃疡造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Detachment of the dead cells produces erosions and ulcers .
chinese: 死亡细胞的脱落，产生糜烂和溃疡。

english: Ulcerative dermatosis is a viral infection of sheep .
chinese: 溃疡性皮肤病是绵羊的一种病毒性传染病。

english: Peptic ulcer is a sharply circumscribed loss of tissue .
chinese: 消化性溃疡是一种界限清楚的组织损毁。

english: Regional lymph nodes become swollen and eventually ulcerate .
chinese: 局部淋巴结先是肿胀而最后发生溃疡。

english: Gastritis may cause symptoms resembling those of peptic ulcer .
chinese: 胃炎可引起类似消化性溃疡的症状。

english: 75% of postbulbar ulcers occur proximal to the duodenal papilla .
chinese: 75的球后溃疡发生在十二指肠乳头近侧。

english: Burning pain is often applied to the sensation of active peptic ulceration .
chinese: 灼痛常适用于活动的消化性溃疡的感觉。

english: Acute ulcerations were responsible for significant gastrointestinal bleeding .
chinese: 急性溃疡形成是显著的胃肠出血的起因。

english: In advanced stages the opaque corneas may ulcerate and even perforate .
chinese: 在疾病后期，不透明的角膜可能产生溃疡，甚至穿孔。
